1. Creating K8s Native Resource ```ServiceAccount``` ```kafka-operator-authproxy``` in ```kafka-operator```
2. Creating K8s Native Resource ```ServiceAccount``` ```kafka-operator``` in ```kafka-operator```
3. Creating K8s Native Resource ```Secret``` ```kafka-operator-serving-cert``` in ```kafka-operator``` having ```data``` ```tls.crt:```
```tls.key:```
```ca.crt:```
4. Creating K8s Native Resource ```ClusterRole``` ```banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-authproxy``` in  can perform actions: ```create``` on ```authentication.k8s.io/tokenreviews```,can perform actions: ```create``` on ```authorization.k8s.io/subjectaccessreviews``` can perform actions: ```create``` on ```authentication.k8s.io/tokenreviews```,can perform actions: ```create``` on ```authorization.k8s.io/subjectaccessreviews```
5. Creating K8s Native Resource ```ClusterRole``` ```banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-operator``` in  can perform actions: ```create and delete and get and list and patch and update and watch``` on ```istio.banzaicloud.io/meshgateways```,can perform actions: ```*``` on ```networking.istio.io/*```,can perform actions: ```create``` on ```/events```,can perform actions: ```get and list and watch``` 6. Creating K8s Native Resource ```ClusterRoleBinding``` ```banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-authproxy``` in   of banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-authproxy with accounts:  ```kafka-operator-authproxy``` in namespace: ```kafka-operator```
7. Creating K8s Native Resource ```ClusterRoleBinding``` ```banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-operator``` in   of banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-operator with accounts:  ```kafka-operator``` in namespace: ```kafka-operator```
8. Creating K8s Native Resource ```Service``` ```banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-alertmanager``` in ```kafka-operator``` Created for ```Pods``` with labels ```control-plane:controller-manager``` and ```controller-tools.k8s.io:1.0``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/name:kafka-operator``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/instance:banzai-kafka-op``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/component:operator```
9. Creating K8s Native Resource ```Service``` ```banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-authproxy``` in ```kafka-operator``` Created for ```Pods``` with labels ```control-plane:controller-manager``` and ```controller-tools.k8s.io:1.0``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/name:kafka-operator``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/instance:banzai-kafka-op``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/component:operator```
10. Creating K8s Native Resource ```Service``` ```banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-operator``` in ```kafka-operator``` Created for ```Pods``` with labels ```control-plane:controller-manager``` and ```controller-tools.k8s.io:1.0``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/name:kafka-operator``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/instance:banzai-kafka-op``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/component:operator```
11. Creating K8s Native Resource ```Deployment``` ```banzai-kafka-op-kafka-operator-operator``` in ```kafka-operator``` Created for ```Pods``` with matchLabels ```control-plane:controller-manager``` and ```controller-tools.k8s.io:1.0``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/name:kafka-operator``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/instance:banzai-kafka-op``` and ```app.kubernetes.io/component:operator```
